document_data.mainbody:
High Songmaster Ansril Ammhaddan was the high priest of the House of Song, a temple dedicated to Milil, in Selgaunt in the midâ€“14 century DR.
Circa 1358 DR, Ansril was the leader of Milils faithful in Selgaunt. His congregation within the temple consisted of 24 other priests and 49 followers. Ansril was a specialty priest of Milil called a tuneservant.
On Uktar 29 of the , during the Sembian Civil War, Prince Rivalen Tanthul summoned a contingent of Sharran priests to help in the upcoming Battle of Selgaunt. However, Ansril together with Aumraeya Ulmdrin and the citys high priests of Deneir, Oghma, Lliira, Lathander, Tymora, and Waukeen protested this to the hulorn Thamalon Uskevren II, but he rebuffed them with an accusation of cowardice.
